name: Rebate Networks GmbH
tag_list: ecommerce, investment, local-ecommerce, group-buying, online-deals, lashou-com, dailydeal-de, michael-brehm, groupon
overview:
Rebate Networks GmbH is one of the leading operators and investors of local e-commerce platforms with unbeatable online deals. The company founds and invests in innovative enterprises all over the world, such as lashou.com in China, dailydeal.de in Germany or kuponvilag.hu in Hungary.

Operated from its headquarters in Berlin Germany, Rebate Networks develops global marketing and technology strategies for an international network of high-tech e-commerce startups. Thereby the company successfully combines revolutionary ideas, profitable business models as well as latest trends, and exports them to fast-growing markets worldwide â€“ to this date to more than 30 countries. Rebate Networks was founded by its CEO Michael Brehm and chairman Stefan GlÃ¤nzer in 2010.
